snippet: Among her many roles, Ms. Colón played Al Pacino’s Cuban mother in “Scarface.” She founded the Puerto Rican Traveling Theater in 1967....

headline.main: Repeal of Health Law Faces a New Hurdle: Older Americans
headline.print_headline: Repeal of Health Law Hits a New Snag: Older Adults

lead_paragraph: Among her many roles, Ms. Colón played Al Pacino’s Cuban mother in “Scarface.” She founded the Puerto Rican Traveling Theater in 1967.
